title: Video: Fishing – Chi Glow (feat. Marcus Whale)
content:
“Going nowhere fast, take it all in slow”

Let me get this straight, I don’t know much about hip-hop and I’m not going to pretend that I do. To be honest, I don’t really know if this is hip-hop. What I do know is that Chi Glow, the latest cut from Sydney duo Fishing is one a hell of a listen. Wrapped in a dream-like electro glaze, the track allows you to drift off, succumbing to the chiming steel drum synths and contorted vocals. This is what Washed Out would sound like if Ernest Greene was a rapper.

Check out the video fro Chi Glow above which features on Fishing’s new album Shy Glow, out June 6th.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
